comments:
The Ant UI needs to be updated for the changes to the annotation mechanism in 
3.0.

See http://dev.eclipse.org/mhonarc/lists/platform-text-dev/msg00112.html

Currently if you attempt to add a bookmark to the Ant editor you get:
java.lang.NullPointerException

As well we do not show the xml problem annoations in the overview ruler.
Logged bug 50019 for the overview ruler problem.

Fixed in AntEditor, AnnotationAccess, AntEditorDocumentProvider, 
IXMLAnnoation, XMLMarkerAnnotation, and XMLProblemAnnotation.
